item.title: Pekwm Development Reboot
item.description: The pekwm development has been non-existent the last couple of years and before that it has been very slow for many years. Many reasons behind this including but not limited to not using a Linux machine at work, life has been busy and a lack of interest. My interest has come back, I’ve gotten myself an “old” Lenovo T440S running OpenBSD at home and started working on pekwm again. To be able to spend more time on actual development and not maintain infrastructure and what-not there has been some changes:
